name: Last Light
overview: Victory is determined at the end of the game based on which ground you hold. The game rewards long-term planning and positional control.
primary_objectives: At the end of the game, score 3 Victory Points if you control 2 or more Primary Objectives. Score 1 Victory Point if you control exactly one.
secondary_objectives: At the end of the game, score 1 Victory Point for each controlled Secondary Objective.
